item.title: Companies House Micro Entity accounts
item.description: This is about the process of using the companies house web site to enter accounts. In Xero there are templates which produce the information you need. Accounts prepared to FRS 105. Directors loans The following is on the assumption that the directors loans are below 7,500Euro and so disclosure is not required in the notes. FRS 105 (March 2018) 6B.20 Note 11 Page 1 Balance Sheet There is a PDF of Page 1.
